item.description:
*This month's meetup will be part of the Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) Monthly Meeting*

 

Join us each month at our powerful learning and networking event for entrepreneurs of color. Hear experts in a wide variety of fields share advice to take you and your enterprise to the next level. This month we officially kick off our 2011 workshop series. The evening will begin with an overview of the exciting new developments we have in store for you. Next up will be our topic speaker, Felix Y. Chang, a Certified Public Accountant to give you the 411 on taxes. His expertise is in taxation for individuals and small businesses. He is also fluent in Mandarin Chinese. Check out his blog at: http://felixychengcpa.blogspot.com/.No matter what field you are in, taxes may not make your business but they can certainly break your business if not handled properly.

The mission of ECHO is to support the entrepreneurial community with impactful, innovative programs that foster growth, stimulate ideas, and build unity.

Free admission with RSVP so register today.

If you would like to sponsor a meeting or provide giveaways, contact echo -at- echonewengland.com

*note area parking is limited. The venue is near the Mass Ave. T stop.

Please use hashtag #echone when tweeting about this event.

Join our mailing list and get weekly, must-know entrepreneurship news. Your bank account will thank you. http://bit.ly/ECHOlist
item.name: Entrepreneurs Meetup: Tax and Accounting Tips
